activities: Company receives personal information in connection with processing orders for its customers.  It also may receive personal information for individuals who visit its website
eucountries: Czech Republic, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: manually processed data, human resources data
privacyprograms: Company has been certified by TRUSTe (TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor seal program).
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data: TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor program
